name: Kill Tiger
description: As the excellent killer,you finally eliminate the last hidden danger of Your Majesty. What you face is not the supreme glory,but the cold shackles. What conspiracy is there behind all this! ? Passing through layers of dense fogs, and getting across the gears layer upon layer, You will search the cruel truth!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
